div.p:
The mission of Barnwell District 19 is to engage, empower and enable
each student to achieve academic excellence and meet the goals of
college and career readiness.

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-8 col-lg-8 backgroundcolor middle-content-panel

div.a: BHPS Board Meeting to be held remotely by phone

span.p: The Barnwell 19 Board of Trustee will hold its monthly meeting remotely at 2:00 p.m., Tuesday, April 21,2020 at 2:00 p.m. due to COVID-19. The public may access the meeting via telephone by dialing the following number: 1-413-648-7631 (PIN: 408343644).

div.a: Informaton about third quarter report cards, spring break and additional instructional packets for your children

span.p: 1. Report Cards will be available on the parent portal Monday, March 30th. Parents who do not have a parent portal account or would like a hard copy of your child's report card should email Ms. Snider at Christina.Snider@barnwell19.net or Mr. Smalls at Eryl.Smalls@barnwell19.net
span.div: 2. Parents: Blackville-Hilda Public Schools will observe Spring Break April 6-10.

3. Instructional packets for your child to work on for the closure extension will be distributed on Monday, April 13th and Tuesday, April 14th from 10:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. Parents are asked to turn in completed instructional packets at that time.

span.p: The Governor has extended the closure of the public schools until April 30th. Our district officials will be meeting tomorrow (March 25) to discuss the creation of new learning packets for students and the date of distribution. Please check back to our website for more information. Parents will also be notified by Alert Now phone calls and emails.
